title: tillai veLiyOnai
sahitya:
tillai veLiyOnai dinamum ninaindiDil illai ini janmamE ibhuvitanil


anupallavi

  kallAl villAl pirambAlaDipaTTu tollai palavETrut-toNDarukkaruL sheyyum


caraNam    muyalgaL sheukkai muTrum oDukkiyE mOnattavattu munivar kaLikkavE
 kayal vizhiyAL shivakAmi-yODandat-tANDavamADum pAdAmbujanai aranai
